results.natural_language: 請查詢所有料號的現有庫存總數量
results.sql:
SELECT INAG001 AS item_no, INAG004 AS warehouse_no, INAG005 AS location_no, INAG007 AS unit, SUM(INAG008) AS existing_stocks
FROM INAG_T
GROUP BY INAG001, INAG004, INAG005, INAG007
LIMIT 100

results.natural_language: 統計所有工單在各工作站的報廢數量總和，按工作站降序排列
results.sql:
SELECT COUNT(SFCADOCNO) AS work_order_count
FROM SFCA_T
LIMIT 100

results.natural_language: 查詢出貨單CNJ-P62-201410140001的出貨明細，包括日期、狀態、料號、數量、單價
results.sql:
SELECT XMDGDOCNO AS doc_no, XMDGDOCDT AS doc_date, SFAA009 AS customer_no, XMDG002 AS sales_person, XMDG003 AS sales_dept, XMDGSTUS AS status, SUM(XMDH016) AS request_qty, SUM(XMDH017) AS actual_qty, SFCADOCNO AS mo_doc_no
FROM XMDG_T, SFCA_T, XMDH_T, SFAA_T
WHERE SFCADOCNO = 'CNJ-P62-201410140001'
GROUP BY XMDGDOCNO, XMDGDOCDT, SFAA009, XMDG002, XMDG003, XMDGSTUS, SFCADOCNO
LIMIT 100
